statements: SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, blockchain_address FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE 'Contract%';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = '84c56547-93bb-4a92-a71b-a1ac8f41daf3';
SELECT contract_name, conditions FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT contract_name, actions FROM smart_contracts WHERE blockchain_address = '0x4D2965C5b80cFcfeE333D8f898a79CD3e1F9a1d7';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT contract_name, blockchain_address FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_code LIKE '%payment%'
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, conditions FROM smart_contracts WHERE actions->'termination' = 'true'
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE conditions->'payment_amount' > 1000
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE blockchain_address IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 3;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_conditions FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY transaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_conditions FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_conditions LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY contract_id DESC;

SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_conditions, transaction_hash, transaction_status FROM smart_contracts JOIN transaction_logs ON smart_contracts.contract_id = transaction_logs.contract_id WHERE transaction_status = 'success' LIMIT 10;

SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_conditions, transaction_timestamp FROM smart_contracts JOIN transaction_logs ON smart_contracts.contract_id = transaction_logs.contract_id WHERE transaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;

SELECT contract_id, contract_name, COUNT(transaction_hash) AS transaction_count FROM smart_contracts JOIN transaction_logs ON smart_contracts.contract_id = transaction_logs.contract_id GROUP BY contract_id, contract_name ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_condition = 'Approved';
SELECT contract_name, contract_condition, contract_code FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_log WHERE executed_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT user_id, wallet_balance FROM user_wallets WHERE wallet_balance > 1000 ORDER BY wallet_balance DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_condition, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE 'T%';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, contract_id, transaction_type, executed_at FROM transaction_log WHERE transaction_type = 'DEPOSIT';
SELECT user_id, wallet_balance FROM user_wallets WHERE last_transaction_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY wallet_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM SmartContracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM SmartContracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_id = 5;
SELECT condition_id, condition_description FROM Conditions ORDER BY condition_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SmartContracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM SmartContracts ORDER BY contract_name ASC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_name, condition_description FROM SmartContracts INNER JOIN Conditions ON SmartContracts.contract_id = Conditions.contract_id;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM Logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM SmartContracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_owner FROM SmartContracts;
SELECT tx_amount, tx_status FROM Transactions WHERE tx_status='success';
SELECT user_name, user_balance FROM Users ORDER BY user_balance DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_timestamp FROM Blocks WHERE block_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY block_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM SmartContracts WHERE contract_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT contract_name, contract_owner FROM SmartContracts WHERE contract_id = '123456';
SELECT user_name, user_balance FROM Users WHERE user_balance > 1000 ORDER BY user_balance DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, block_timestamp FROM Blocks ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, tx_amount, tx_status FROM Transactions WHERE tx_status = 'approved' AND tx_amount > 500 ORDER BY tx_timestamp ASC;
